headline: Launch HN: Self-hosted n8n on AWS with Microtica 2.0
description:
Hi HN! This is Alex from the Microtica team (https://microtica.com). Microtica is a platform for easy infrastructure setup and app deployment on your AWS account. We provide ready-to-use templates to quickly spin-up infrastructure for your apps with built-in security, monitoring, and scalability. Currently, we have around 20 templates and infrastructure components, but we’ll add more to our catalogue.

One of our most recent templates is n8n workflow automation (https://microtica.com/templates/n8n). You can build complex workflows and host them on your own infrastructure the same day you start developing. Connect Git for your n8n app, select the cluster you want and deploy.

Fast, without going through tutorials, for free.

Thanks for your time, and would love to hear your feedback!
headline_zh-Hans: 启动HN：使用Microtica 2.0在AWS上自我托管的n8n
headline_zh-Hant: 啟動HN：使用Microtica 2.0在AWS上自我託管的n8n
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN! 我是Microtica团队的Alex（https://microtica.com）。Microtica是一个平台，用于在你的AWS账户上轻松设置基础设施和部署应用程序。我们提供现成的模板，为你的应用程序快速启动基础设施，并提供内置的安全性、监控和可扩展性。目前，我们有大约20个模板和基础设施组件，但我们会在目录中增加更多。

我们最近的一个模板是n8n工作流自动化（https://microtica.com/templates/n8n）。你可以建立复杂的工作流程，并在开始开发的同一天将其托管在你自己的基础设施上。为你的n8n应用程序连接Git，选择你想要的集群并进行部署。

速度快，不需要通过教程，免费。

谢谢你的时间，并希望听到你的反馈!
